## Quick Actions

### Check VM status
```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-evals
uv run python -m openadapt_evals.benchmarks.cli vm-status --vm-name waa-eval-vm --resource-group openadapt-agents
```

### Start VM
```bash
uv run python -m openadapt_evals.benchmarks.cli vm-start --vm-name waa-eval-vm --resource-group openadapt-agents
```

### Stop VM (save costs)
```bash
uv run python -m openadapt_evals.benchmarks.cli vm-stop --vm-name waa-eval-vm --resource-group openadapt-agents
```

### Start VM + WAA server (all-in-one)
```bash
uv run python -m openadapt_evals.benchmarks.cli up --vm-name waa-eval-vm --resource-group openadapt-agents
```

### View job details
```bash
az ml job show --name <job-name> --resource-group openadapt-agents --workspace-name openadapt-ml
```

### Refresh this dashboard
```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-evals
python refresh_vm_dashboard.py --vm-name waa-eval-vm --resource-group openadapt-agents
```
